output_list.description:
The vulnerability exists in the line `totalAmount += _amounts[a];`. 
This allows an attacker to set the balance of an arbitrary user to any value.

description: Refund logic is improperly tied to state updates, enabling DoS attacks.

output_list.description: Relies on outdated constructor naming conventions prone to typos.
The mint function allows an attacker to set the balance of an arbitrary user to any value.
